content.rendered:
Best credit card processing with EV terminals in Los Angeles.

Whether you’re taking payments in your retail store or in the field, you can accept EMV chip cards in person with our wide range of EMV terminal options. Safe, secure, simple. 

Accept Payments Now

EMV terminals offer secure payment processing, utilizing chip card technology to protect against fraud and enhance payment security for businesses and customers.

  • Recurring Payments
  • Reduced Fraud
  • Fast checkout speed
Apply Today

Leading Los Angeles credit card processors with EMV Terminals.

Advanced Security

Get advanced security for payment transactions, protecting against fraud and data breaches.

Reduce Chargebacks

EMV technology reduces chargebacks by enhancing payment security and fraud prevention.
Speak to an Expert

What is ‘liability shift’ when using EMV terminals?

The term ‘liability shift’ refers to the change in responsibility for fraudulent transactions when using EMV terminals. Before the adoption of EMV chip technology, banks often bore the cost of card-present fraud. However, with EMV, if a business does not have an EMV-enabled terminal and a fraudulent transaction occurs, the liability may shift to the business rather than the bank, making the adoption of EMV technology crucial for security and financial protection. 

Seamless integration with your POS.

Our EMV terminals seamlessly integrate with your existing point-of-sale (POS) systems, providing a convenient and secure payment solution. With this integration, you can upgrade your payment processing capabilities while maintaining the familiarity of your current POS setup. This ensures a smooth transition to EMV technology, enhancing security and protecting your business from fraud and chargebacks while optimizing the checkout process for both you and your customers. 

01 02

Step 1

Apply for an account and get approved in as little as 24 hours. 

Step 2

Integrate with your existing software or get started with our tools. 

Step 3

Enjoy low fees and 24/7 customer support with a real person. 

Leading Los Angeles credit card service for EMV terminals.
